p: Using five different starting structures, ten simulation trajectories were simulated to obtain the force-time profiles shown in Fig. 4. The mean rupture forces of ErmCL and H-NS are 2,242 and 1,359 pN, respectively, indicating that ErmCL is harder to pull through the tunnel (Table 4). The non-equilibrium work also leads to a similar conclusion (Table 4). Thus, these results are in agreement with our earlier simulations.
